dcterms:description: The Spacecraft PosE Estimation Dataset (SPEED) consists of high-fidelity grayscale images of the Tango satellite, with 12,000 training images containing ground truth 6DOF poses and 2,998 testing images without ground truth. The images vary in size, orientation, and lighting conditions, simulating proximity operations.
dcterms:title: Spacecraft PosE Estimation Dataset (SPEED)
